Name: Square Rounds
About the game: Square Round's is a Colorful Shooter Survival Round based game with no blood just different explosion types for each enemy. Survive each round and see how far you can achieve. Can you survive all 350 rounds? If you can, you shall be compared to a legend and rewarded with a way to celebrate your victory. Easily pause the game when needed to take a break. Game difficulty increases, starts easy and gets more difficult as the rounds increase due to more enemies each round. Also saves your High score and High Round to try to beat your own records. There is an Armor and Health System that is filled up by picking up drops from destroyed enemies. Also includes a mini map to help you know where close enough enemies are. You can even play inside of the mini map for an alternate retro look. No Ammo pickups, trusty laser never runs out of ammo. Includes a how to play to explore the four enemy types, Game objective, and key inputs. Great game for Novice and Expert experience levels alike. Mouse and keyboard is the Recommended and preferred input method. Music By Wild 9 Productions LLC.
